title: Stuck at 6.24 Please HELP
body: My client will not update to the most recent patch. If someone could show me how to force update it would make my day :D

replies.body:
Most issues during the patching process are caused by either poor permissions or an unstable connection to our patching servers. I recommend you work through our [**Patching Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), as it covers the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if this fixed the issue for you.
